attributes.action: Stop the payments to WHO using taxpayers money and never offer to pay our money
attributes.additional_details:
We do not want our money sent to organisations like this especially ones abroad.  Its British taxpayers money and the Government is elected to serve those that voted them in as well as those that didnt.  It did not elect you to throw away what little money we have left to the dogs.  
The government beed to be more transparent with how they spend money  in foreign aid such as sending money to the WHO
attributes.background:
Do not hand over our taxpayers money to organisations without at least a debate but in these circumstances a vote
The British people who pay your wages do not want this
